title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2018 Vault BarDual BTC / ETH bearer bar. Comes with hologramsOriginal thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4355883.0STARTING BID: 0.0005BTCLOT 2: 2015 CoinedBits "Satoshi Nakomoto" alloy coin/box*Last name is misspelled on the coin*STARTING BID: 0.0001BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEBTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTCPlease limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal placesEND TIME: NOVEMBER 13th, 2023, 14:00:00 PSTPayment due within 24 hours of auction end!!SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: The 2018 Vault Bar would be so fire if it was just Bitcoin. The ETH side totally ruins it, especially the "decentralized" part.The DAO hack of 2016 proved that the ETH Foundation and core developers had control over the ETH blockchain after they paused it and reversed the hacker's transactions out of existence. The famous Vitalik Buterin quote "ok you guys can stop trading now".This is also the reason why ETH Classic was born. Did that go down the Orwellian memory hole for everyone?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Cyrus on November 09, 2023, 06:39:54 PMLot 1: 0.0007 BTCLot 2: 0.0007 BTCCurrent high bidsEnds tomorrow afternoon

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on November 08, 2023, 03:35:27 PMThe 2018 Vault Bar would be so fire if it was just Bitcoin. The ETH side totally ruins it, especially the "decentralized" part.The DAO hack of 2016 proved that the ETH Foundation and core developers had control over the ETH blockchain after they paused it and reversed the hacker's transactions out of existence. The famous Vitalik Buterin quote "ok you guys can stop trading now".This is also the reason why ETH Classic was born. Did that go down the Orwellian memory hole for everyone? I 100% agree,  Btc only would have made that bar amazing !   ETH = YuckI didn’t know any details about that 2016 thing. Thanks for bringing it to light
